Wisdom: الصَّبْرُ يُهَوِّنُ الْفَجِيعَةَ
enWisdom: Patience makes tragedy easier to bear

Wisdom: الصَّبْرُ عُدَّةٌ لِلْبَلَاءِ [البلاء]
enWisdom: Patience is an asset for [facing] affliction

Wisdom: الصَّبْرُ يَنْزِلُ عَلَى قَدْرِ الْمُصِيبَةِ
enWisdom: Patience descends [in proportion to] to the extent of the hardship

Wisdom: الصَّبْرُ عَلَى الْمَصَائِبِ مِنْ أَفْضَلِ الْمَوَاهِبِ
enWisdom: Patience in times of difficulty is from the best endowments

Wisdom: الصَّبْرُ عَلَى الْمُصِيبَةِ يَفُلُّ حَدَّ [يقل جد] الشَّامِتِ
enWisdom: Patience in hardship blunts the edge of the one who rejoices in your suffering

Wisdom: الصَّبْرُ عَلَى الْمُصِيبَةِ يُجْزِلُ الْمَثُوبَةَ
enWisdom: Patience in times of hardship makes reward abundant

Wisdom: الصَّبْرُ عَلَى النَّوَائِبِ يُنِيلُ شَرَفَ الْمَرَاتِبِ
enWisdom: Patience in the face of calamities makes one attain honourable ranks

Wisdom: الْكَمَالُ فِي ثَلَاثٍ الصَّبْرِ عَلَى النَّوَائِبِ وَالتَّوَرُّعِ فِي الْمَطَالِبِ وَإِسْعَافِ الطَّالِبِ
enWisdom: Perfection is in three things: Patience in calamities, piety in pursuits and fulfilling the needs of the seeker

Wisdom: الصَّبْرُ عَلَى الْبَلَاءِ أَفْضَلُ مِنَ الْعَافِيَةِ فِي الرَّخَاءِ
enWisdom: Patience in affliction is better than wellbeing in [times of] comfort

Wisdom: الصَّبْرُ صَبْرَانِ صَبْرٌ عَلَى مَا تَكْرَهُ وَصَبْرٌ عَمَّا تُحِبُّ
enWisdom: Patience is of two types: enduring what you hate and abstaining from what you love

Wisdom: اشْتَغِلْ بِالصَّبْرِ عَلَى الرَّزِيَّةِ عَنِ الْجَزَعِ لَهَا
enWisdom: Occupy yourself with patience in adversity instead of being distressed by it

Wisdom: اطْرَحْ عَنْكَ وَارِدَاتِ الْهُمُومِ بِعَزَائِمِ الصَّبْرِ وَحُسْنِ الْيَقِينِ
enWisdom: Cast away the sorrows that come upon you through resolute patience and virtuous certitude

Wisdom: أَقْوَى عُدَدِ الشَّدَائِدِ الصَّبْرُ
enWisdom: The strongest resource for [facing] difficulties is patience

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الصَّبْرِ عِنْدَ مُرِّ الْفَجِيعَةِ
enWisdom: The best patience is during the bitter pain of tragedy

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ عُدَّةِ الصَّبْرِ عَلَى الشِّدَّةِ
enWisdom: The best asset is patience in difficulty

Wisdom: إِنِ ابْتَلَاكُمُ اللَّهُ بِمُصِيبَةٍ فَاصْبِرُوا
enWisdom: If Allah tests you with some hardship, then be patient

Wisdom: إِنَّكُمْ إِنْ صَبَرْتُمْ عَلَى الْبَلَاءِ وَشَكَرْتُمْ فِي الرَّخَاءِ وَرَضِيتُمْ بِالْقَضَاءِ كَانَ لَكُمْ مِنَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ الرِّضَا
enWisdom: Verily if you are patient in affliction, thankful in comfort and satisfied with the [divine] decree, you will gain the pleasure of Allah, the Glorified

Wisdom: إِذَا ابْتُلِيتَ فَاصْبِرْ
enWisdom: When you are tested, be patient

Wisdom: إِذَا صَبَرْتَ لِلْمِحْنَةِ فَلَلْتَ حَدَّهَا
enWisdom: When you are patient in adversity, you blunt its edge

Wisdom: إِذَا فَاجَأَكَ الْبَلَاءُ فَتَحَصَّنْ بِالصَّبْرِ وَالِاسْتِظْهَارِ
enWisdom: When adversity takes you by surprise, then seek refuge in patience and in seeking assistance [from Allah]

Wisdom: ثَلَاثٌ مَنْ كُنَّ فِيهِ فَقَدْ رُزِقَ خَيْرَ الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ هُنَّ الرِّضَا بِالْقَضَاءِ وَالصَّبْرُ عَلَى الْبَلَاءِ وَالشُّكْرُ فِي الرَّخَاءِ
enWisdom: One who is endowed with religion is endowed with the good of this world and the Hereafter

Wisdom: ثَوَابُ الْمُصِيبَةِ عَلَى قَدْرِ الصَّبْرِ عَلَيْهَا
enWisdom: The reward for hardship is proportionate to the patience exhibited in it

Wisdom: سِلَاحُ الْمُوقِنِ الصَّبْرُ عَلَى الْبَلَاءِ وَالشُّكْرُ فِي الرَّخَاءِ
enWisdom: The weapon of the possessor of certitude is patience in [times of] hardship and thankfulness in well-being

Wisdom: صَبْرُكَ عَلَى الْمُصِيبَةِ يُخَفَّفُ الرَّزِيَّةَ وَيُجْزِلُ الْمَثُوبَةَ
enWisdom: Your patience in [times of] hardship lightens the adversity and brings abundant reward

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِالصَّبْرِ فِي الضِّيقِ وَالْبَلَاءِ
enWisdom: Espouse patience in distress and tribulation

Wisdom: فِي الْبَلَاءِ تُحَازُ فَضِيلَةُ الصَّبْرِ
enWisdom: In tribulation the excellence of patience is realized

Wisdom: كُنْ حُلْوَ الصَّبْرِ عِنْدَ مُرِّ الْأَمْرِ
enWisdom: Have sweet patience during the bitter affair

Wisdom: كُنْ فِي الشَّدَائِدِ صَبُوراً وَفِي الزَّلَازِلِ وَقُوراً
enWisdom: Be patient in [the face of] difficulties and dignified in [times of] turbulent upheavals

Wisdom: لِكُلِّ مُصَابٍ اصْطِبَارٌ
enWisdom: For every afflicted one there is [a refuge in] patience

Wisdom: لَيْسَ مَعَ الصَّبْرِ مُصِيبَةٌ
enWisdom: With patience, there is no adversity

Wisdom: مَنْ صَبَرَ هَانَتْ مُصِيبَتُهُ
enWisdom: Whoever is patient, his hardship becomes easy [to bear]

Wisdom: مَنْ صَبَرَ عَلَى النَّكْبَةِ كَأَنْ لَمْ يُنْكَبْ
enWisdom: One who is not saved by patience, is destroyed by agitation

Wisdom: مَنِ ادَّرَعَ جُنَّةَ الصَّبْرِ هَانَتْ عَلَيْهِ النَّوَائِبُ
enWisdom: Whoever arms himself with the shield of patience, calamities become easy for him [to bear]

Wisdom: مَنْ عَظَّمَ صِغَارَ الْمَصَائِبِ ابْتَلَاهُ اللَّهُ بِكِبَارِهَا
enWisdom: One who exaggerates small hardships, Allah tries him with great ones

Wisdom: مَنْ صَبَرَ عَلَى بَلَاءِ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ فَحَقَّ اللَّهِ أَدَّى وَعِقَابَهُ اتَّقَى وَثَوَابَهُ رَجَا
enWisdom: One who is patient in the trial of Allah, the Glorified, has fulfilled the right of Allah, has feared His chastisement and has hoped for His reward

Wisdom: مِنْ كُنُوزِ الْإِيمَانِ الصَّبْرُ عَلَى الْمَصَائِبِ
enWisdom: Patience during hardships is from the treasures of faith

Wisdom: مِنْ أَفْضَلِ الْحَزْمِ الصَّبْرُ عَلَى النَّوَائِبِ
enWisdom: Patience in [times of] calamities is from the best judiciousness

Wisdom: مِنْ عَلَامَاتِ حُسْنِ السَّجِيَّةِ الصَّبْرُ عَلَى الْبَلِيَّةِ
enWisdom: Patience during tribulation is one of the signs of good character

Wisdom: نِعْمَ الْمَعُونَةُ الصَّبْرُ عَلَى الْبَلَاءِ
enWisdom: How good a succor patience is during tribulation!

Wisdom: لَا يَدْعُوَنَّكَ ضِيقٌ لَزِمَكَ فِي عَهْدِ اللَّهِ إِلَى النَّكْثِ فَإِنَّ صَبْرَكَ عَلَى ضِيقٍ تَرْجُو انْفِرَاجَهُ وَفَضْلَ عَاقِبَتِهِ خَيْرٌ لَكَ مِنْ عُذْرٍ تَخَافُ تَبِعَتَهُ وَتُحِيطُ بِكَ مِنَ اللَّهِ لِأَجْلِهِ الْعُقُوبَةُ
enWisdom: Never let the hardship that you undergo in [fulfilling] the covenant of Allah lead you to break it, for indeed your patience during the hardship from which you seek relief and a favourable outcome are better for you than the excuse [and betrayal] whose evil consequences you fear and because of which you are encompassed by chastisement from Allah
